member.name: T:LeituraXml.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:LeituraXml.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:LeituraXml.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:LeituraXml.Conexao.AddArrayParameters(System.Collections.IEnumerable,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adiciona um vetor de parametros ao MySqlCommand.
member.param: O vetor de strings que deve ser adicionada aos parametros.
Nome dado ao parametro base. Este valor envolta de {} na query (CommandText) vai ser trocado.
member.example: SELECT * FROM table WHERE field IN ({paramNomeBase})
member.param: A string utilizada para separar os parametros na query.
member.returns: Use o retorno para a parte da query que utiliza o IN.
